pageContext.claim: “If ObamaCare is hurting people, & it is, why shouldn’t it hurt the insurance companies & why should Congress not be paying what public pays?”
pageContext.analysis: Members of Congress and most staff get health insurance via Obamacare, as they were kicked off the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program when the law was implemented. Consistent with the FEHBP, the federal government pays about 70 percent of the cost of premiums.
